location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ābu] to Dr William Wilson Hunter

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Dr Hunter's intention to visit Rajpootana [Rājasthān] during the cold season and detailing the arrangements to be made by Pelly during his stay, his itinerary including visits to the towns of Pallee [Pāli], Jodhpore [Jodhpur], Saumbhur [Sambhar] Lake, Jeypore [Jaipur] and Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] and noting that he will be in Aboo [Ābu] until early October as well as inviting him to join Pelly on some of his travels.
